items.sentence: Do you think you\'d have time to help me learn French?
I\'m supposed to make sure Tom gets to school on time.
I think it\'d be better if you didn\'t go out tonight.
I just wanted to tell you I ran into Tom this morning.
Did you know that Tom is planning on moving to Boston?
Did you know that Tom was kidnapped when he was three?
Do you have any idea how much work has gone into this?
Do you have any idea what the population of Boston is?
I almost forgot to tell Tom about tomorrow\'s meeting.
Tom thought it would be a good idea if Mary got a gun.
